scripts.dev: npm run workspace nestjs-environment-variables-provider watch & npm run workspace test dev
scripts.format: npm run workspaces foreach --all run format
scripts.lint: npm run workspaces foreach --all run lint
scripts.test: npm run workspaces foreach --all run test
scripts.tsc: npm run workspaces foreach --all run tsc
scripts.unit: npm run workspaces foreach --all run unit
